metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20212 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Privoxy in versions before 3.0.29. Memory leak ifmultiple filters are executed and the last one is skipped due to a pcreerror leading to a system crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.26-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.26-5ubuntu0.1').
